text: Wieczorek (archaic feminine: Wieczorkowa, plural Wieczorkowie) is one of the most common surnames in Poland, and the second most common in Opole Silesia (2,654) and Świętokrzyskie (2,654). Notable people include: * Antoni Wieczorek (1924-1992), Polish ski jumper * Christian Wieczorek (born 1985), German football player * Denis Wieczorek (born 1991), German figure skater * Heidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul (born 1942), German politician * Henryk Wieczorek (born 1949), Polish football player * Jan Wieczorek, German chemist * Kristin Wieczorek (born 1986), German figure skater * Mariusz Wieczorek, Polish canoeist * Rainer Wieczorek (born 1956), German writer * Ryszard Wieczorek (born 1962), Polish football player and manager Category:Polish-language surnames Category:Surnames of Silesian origin
title: Wieczorek
